___mouse_life_stage.comment: mouse_life_stage is not valid for a human biosample.
___mouse_life_stage.title: Mouse life stage

___internal_tags.description: Some biosamples are part of particular data collections
___internal_tags.title: Internal tags

___pooled_from.description: The biosamples from which aliquots were pooled to form the biosample.
___pooled_from.title: Pooled from

items.description: A biosample from which an aliquot was taken to form the biosample.

___culture_harvest_date.description: For cultured samples, the date the biosample was taken.
___culture_harvest_date.comment: Date can be submitted in as YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSTZD (TZD is the time zone designator; use Z to express time in UTC or for time expressed in local time add a time zone offset from UTC +HH:MM or -HH:MM.
___culture_harvest_date.title: Culture harvest date

___model_organism_mating_status.description: The mating status of the animal.
___model_organism_mating_status.title: Mating status

___model_organism_health_status.comment: model_organism_health_status is not valid for a human biosample.
___model_organism_health_status.title: Model organism donor health status

___talens.description: TALEN constructs used to modify the biosample
___talens.title: TALEN constructs

items.description: TALEN used to modify the biosample
items.title: TALEN

___date_obtained.description: For tissue samples, the date the biosample was taken.
___date_obtained.comment: Date can be submitted in as YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSTZD (TZD is the time zone designator; use Z to express time in UTC or for time expressed in local time add a time zone offset from UTC +HH:MM or -HH:MM).
___date_obtained.title: Date obtained

___documents.description: Documents that describe the biosample preparation.

___post_synchronization_time_units.comment: Use in conjunction with post_synchronization_time to specify time elapsed post-synchronization.
___post_synchronization_time_units.title: Post-synchronization time units

___subcellular_fraction_term_name.description: The GO (Gene Ontology) term name for cellular component that constitutes the biosample.
___subcellular_fraction_term_name.title: Subcellular fraction name

___starting_amount.description: The initial quantity of cells or tissue obtained.
___starting_amount.title: Starting amount

elasticsearch_mapping_index_type.description: Defines one of three types of indexing available
elasticsearch_mapping_index_type.title: Field mapping index type

___description.description: A plain text description of the biosample. Do not include experiment details, constructs or treatments.
___description.title: Description

___passage_number.description: In calculating passage number, include passages from the source.
___passage_number.title: Passage number

___url.description: An external resource with additional information about the biosample.
___url.title: URL

___fly_life_stage.comment: fly_life_stage is not valid for a human biosample.
___fly_life_stage.title: Fly life stage

___depleted_in_term_name.description: UBERON (Uber Anatomy Ontology) term best matching the tissue(s)/body part(s) that were removed from the biosample.
___depleted_in_term_name.title: Depleted in term

___donor.comment: For human biosamples, see human_donor.json for available identifiers. For mouse biosamples, see mouse_donor.json for available identifiers.
___donor.title: Donor

___post_treatment_time_units.comment: Use in conjunction with treatment to specify time elapsed post-treatment.
___post_treatment_time_units.title: Post-treatment time units

___model_organism_age.description: The age or age range of the model donor organism when biological material was sampled.
___model_organism_age.comment: model_organism_age is not valid for a human biosample.
___model_organism_age.title: Model organism donor age

___worm_life_stage.comment: worm_life_stage is not valid for a human biosample.
___worm_life_stage.title: Worm life stage
enum: mixed stage (late embryonic and L1 larva)

___host.description: A biosample that was hosting this biosample.
___host.title: Host biosample

___constructs.description: Expression or targeting vectors stably or transiently transfected (not RNAi or TALEN).
___constructs.title: DNA constructs

items.description: An expression or targeting vector stably or transiently transfected (not RNAi).
items.title: DNA Constructs

___post_synchronization_time.comment: Use in conjunction with fly_sychronization_stage or worm_synchronization_stage to specify time elapsed post-synchronization.
___post_synchronization_time.title: Post-synchronization time

___rnais.description: RNAi vectors stably or transiently transfected.
___rnais.title: RNAi vectors

items.description: RNAi vector stably or transiently transfected.
items.title: RNAi Vector

___derived_from.description: A biosample that the sample derives from via a construct or treatment.
___derived_from.title: Derived from

items.description: A unique identifier from external resource.
items.title: External identifier

___fly_synchronization_stage.comment: Stage at which flies were synchronized. Use in conjunction with time and time units post-synchronization.
___fly_synchronization_stage.title: Fly synchronization stage
enum: puff stage: PS (1-2), dark blue gut
puff stage: PS (3-6), light blue gut

___post_treatment_time.comment: Use in conjunction with treatment to specify time elapsed post-treatment.
___post_treatment_time.title: Post-treatment time

___transfection_type.description: The persistence of the transfection construct.
___transfection_type.title: Transfection type

___transfection_method.description: How the transfection was performed on the biosample to introduce the contruct or RNAi.
___transfection_method.title: Transfection method

___model_organism_age_units.comment: model_organism_age_units are not valid for a human biosample.
___model_organism_age_units.title: Model organism donor age units

___model_organism_sex.comment: model_organism_sex is not valid for a human biosample.
___model_organism_sex.title: Model organism sex

___culture_start_date.description: For cultured samples, the date the culture was started. For cell lines, the date this particular growth was started, not the date the line was established.
___culture_start_date.comment: Date can be submitted in as YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSTZD ((TZD is the time zone designator; use Z to express time in UTC or for time expressed in local time add a time zone offset from UTC +HH:MM or -HH:MM).
___culture_start_date.title: Culture start date

___part_of.description: A biosample from which a discrete component was taken. That component is this biosample.
___part_of.title: Separated from

___worm_synchronization_stage.comment: Stage at which worms were synchronized. Use in conjunction with time and time units post-synchronization.
___worm_synchronization_stage.title: Worm synchronization stage
